metadata.description: Will Solana touch or exceed $120.00 on 2026-02-15 (UTC) based on CoinGecko?

outcome_space.description: Whether Solana USD will reach or exceed $120.00 at any time during 2026-02-15 UTC, using CoinGecko USD price samples.

base_case.condition: Let P be the set of all USD price samples returned by CoinGecko at $.prices[*][1] within the UTC window [2026-02-15T00:00:00Z, 2026-02-16T00:00:00Z) (start inclusive, end exclusive). Let M = max(P). Truncate M to 2 decimal places. If truncated M >= 120.00, resolve YES.
base_case.fsp_resolution: FSP = 1 if {outcome} is true. FSP = 0 if {outcome} is false.

edge_cases.condition: If CoinGecko returns zero price samples in the observation window.

outcome_point.outcome: Truncated max sample of Solana Price reported by CoinGecko is >= 120.00 USD.

oracle_config.description: Automated oracle: fetch Solana USD prices from CoinGecko over a fixed 24h UTC window, compute max over returned samples, truncate to 2 decimals, then compare against 120.00.
